name: Robot Rampage (itch) (Berecik)
description:
ROBOT RAMPAGE

There has been a robot uprising and you have to stop it! Or maybe you're the evil robot?

Does it even matter? Destroy waves of enemies in this dynamic top-down shooter! Explosions, bullets flying, the rush of battle. How long can you survive?

You have three weapons at your disposal. A pistol, a rifle and a shotgun. Make good use of them, each has its own strengths and weaknesses.

The controls are simple - WSAD for movement and mouse for looking and shooting. You can change your weapons with numbers or using the scroll wheel. There's also controller support, but only in game.
